title: Help client not working üîß
body: Every time I try to open my client it just sends me to the game but then it says it not the proper way to do it. And sometimes it does not even respond. I just re-downloaded lol yesterday and it started doing this today. Tell me if you can help me please.

replies.body:
Can you try running the game by using 
> C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\League Client.exe

and see if that works? If that doesn't resolve the issue, can you post a screenshot of the error you're getting?

Never Mind i found out a solution ;-). I had to remove PBE. My friend suggested this for a random reason and since i dont use pbe any way i deleted it. Now lol works.
But thanks for the help!
Sorry but what do you mean C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\League Client.exe? Do i put it in my terminal?
I re-downloaded lol but it says ‚ÄúLeague of Legends‚Äù is damaged and can‚Äôt be opened. Google Chrome downloaded this file yesterday at 2:13pm from signup.oce.leagueoflegends.com.
